name: DCT Aviation
about: DCT Aviation, located at the Oakland County International Airport in Waterford, Michigan, is a premier flight training facility serving the Metro Detroit area. With a diverse fleet of 10 aircraft, including single-engine Piper Archer IIâ€™s and multi-engine Beechcraft Duchess, we cater to both recreational and professional pilots. Our team of highly trained instructors and advanced simulators ensure comprehensive training programs from Private Pilot to Multi-Engine ATP. We offer one-on-one instruction, flexible scheduling, and an FAA Designated Computer Testing Center. Experience the freedom of flying with our introductory Discovery Flight for $150, with a $50 reimbursement if you pursue your pilot's license. DCT Aviation is dedicated to making your flying dreams come true with a culture of excellence and safety. Contact us to start your aviation journey today.
services:
